summary.para: The Chart Designer used to design a chart at runtime.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Charts.Designer.ChartDesigner.#ctor(DevExpress.Xpf.Charts.ChartControl)

summary.para: Creates a Chart Designer for the specified chart control.

member.param: A object that is a chart control for which a chart designer is created.

summary.para: Closes the chart designer with the chart currently being edited.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Charts.Designer.ChartDesigner.Show(System.Windows.Window,DevExpress.Xpf.Core.Theme)
member.param: A object specifying the parent window.
A object specifying the theme of the Designer.
